e="preserve">Dwight Anthony Anderson (December 28, 1960 – September 5, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He was born in Dayton, Ohio.
Anderson was selected by the Washington Bullets in the 2nd round of the 1982 NBA draft. He played one season for Denver Nuggets from 1982 to 1983. Anderson also spent several seasons in the Continental Basketball Association.
Anderson died on September 5, 2020 at the age of 59.
